tess.actuators.thermostats.ecobee.pyecobee package¶

Module contents¶

Python Code for Communication with the Ecobee Thermostat

class tess.actuators.thermostats.ecobee.pyecobee.Ecobee(appname, ecobee_info, db, config_filename=None, api_key=None, config=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class for storing Ecobee Thermostats and Sensors

get_thermostats()[source]¶

Set self.thermostats to a json list of thermostats from ecobee

refresh_tokens()[source]¶

refresh tokens fail sometimes although it shouldn’t fail when the api_key and refresh_tokens are provided. Let’s try at max 5 times with sleep 2 seconds

request_pin()[source]¶

Method to request a PIN from ecobee for authorization

Method to request API tokens from ecobee

Set a climate hold - ie away, home, sleep

set_fan_min_on_time(index, fan_min_on_time)[source]¶

The minimum time, in minutes, to run the fan each hour. Value from 1 to 60

Set a hold

set_hvac_mode(index, hvac_mode)[source]¶

possible hvac modes are auto, auxHeatOnly, cool, heat, off
